thing1.title: Thing One
thing1.blurb: Lots of fun on a rainy day!
thing1.desc: This Thing will not bite you. It wants to have fun! Would you like to shake hands with your new friend Thing One?
warnings: Thing One has a penchant for flying kites indoors and causing many bumps and thumps.

thing2.title: Thing Two
thing2.blurb: Lots of fun on a rainy day!
thing2.desc: Having fun is what this Thing is wanting to do! Come say hello to your new friend Thing Two!
warnings: Thing Two loves spotted dresses, but should be kept away from the headboards of beds.

winslow.title: The Winslow
winslow.desc: Indestructible, presumably immortal, and figures prominently in fully three quarters of the galaxy's religions. Some fear it, some worship, nearly everyone wants it!
warnings: Buying the Winslow will result in facing the combined wrath of everyone else who wants the Winslow.
Possibly dumber than a sack of bricks.

briefcase.title: The Briefcase
briefcase.desc: Is that what you think it is? Is it a diamonds? a soul? a nuclear bomb? or simply a ten-watt light bulb? All you know for certain is that it's beautiful.
